alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; DuPage; Eastern Will; Lake; Northern Cook; Northern Will; Southern Cook; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:51PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lake, Will, eastern DuPage and Cook Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 150 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking isolated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Northbrook to near Willow Springs to near Elwood. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chicago, Joliet, Naperville, Cicero, Arlington Heights, Evanston, Schaumburg, Bolingbrook, Palatine, Skokie, Des Plaines, Orland Park, Tinley Park, Oak Lawn, Berwyn, Mount Prospect, Wheaton, Oak Park, Downers Grove and Glenview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Cook; DuPage; Eastern Will; Lake; Northern Cook; Northern Will; Southern Cook; Southern Will
